fr.liglab.adele.icasa.mail.service

Interface MailSender


  • public interface MailSender
    Simple interface to specify a mail sender service !

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean sendAlertMail(String sendTo)
      Method to send an alert mail !
      boolean sendReport(String sendTo, String subject, String body, File attachementFile)
      Method to send a report mail !
      boolean sendSimpleMail(String sendTo, String subject, String body)
      Method to send a simple mail !

    • Method Detail

      • sendReport

        boolean sendReport(String sendTo,
                 String subject,
                 String body,
                 File attachementFile)
        Method to send a report mail ! It will send a mail with attached report !
        Parameters:
        sendTo - : the people to send the report
        subject - : the subject of the mail
        body - : the content of the mail
        attachementFile - : the attachement File to send
        Returns:
        true if the mail is correctly send false if not !

      • sendSimpleMail

        boolean sendSimpleMail(String sendTo,
                     String subject,
                     String body)
        Method to send a simple mail !
        Parameters:
        sendTo - : the people to send the mail
        subject - : the subject of the mail
        body - : the content of the mail
        Returns:
        true if the mail is correctly send false if not !

      • sendAlertMail

        boolean sendAlertMail(String sendTo)
        Method to send an alert mail !
        Parameters:
        sendTo - : the author to send the alert
        Returns:
        true if the mail is correctly send false if not !
